description:
This application is a compilation of high-resolution photographs containing landscapes, seascapes, animal, and plant life. Each of the 365 photographs is accompanied by a thought-provoking and inspiring haiku poem, suitable for daily contemplation, or just plain browsing for words of wisdom and encouragement. These pearls of poetry have been providing satire and irony, as well as poignancy of appreciation and love since the 15th century.

There are exactly 365 messages for the reader – one for each day of the year. The application opens to the current date, but can be scrolled or searched by date. Each day is presented with multiple purposes, including emphasis on attaining goals, affirmations of love, and appreciation of the natural world around us. The author blends the readers’ visual perception of the images with the intellectual stimulation of the haikus to produce a sensation larger than the sum of its parts.

To be enjoyed every day when the application is opened. Always current, always easy to peruse, and never a disappointment when words of encouragement, or hope, or pure fun are needed at the touch of a finger.
